course_title: Policy Analysis and Change - POL ANYLS CHNG

sections.comments: This section of the course is ONLINE- distance education. Your instructor and course support staff will contact you by email prior to and during the course. Please ensure you have a valid email account.  You will need your Campus Wide Login (CWL) to login to your course at https://www.elearning.ubc.ca/ . Course materials must be ordered or picked up at the UBC Bookstore. More information can be found under Distance Learning at : http://ctlt.ubc.ca/ Admission to the Faculty of Dentistry is mandatory before registering (see website www.dentistry.ubc.ca)It is important to be sure that your distance course is eligible under the student loan program.  For your reference: http://www.students.ubc.ca/finance/loans.cfm?page=courseloads

description: Critical reviews of oral health care delivery, oral disease processes and dental hygiene.
